title: Got questions? We have answers!
description: Browse through our frequently asked questions or reach out if you need more information.

faqItems.question: What kind of projects do you work on?
faqItems.answer: We work on a wide range of IT projects, from web applications to complex backend systems. We specialize in technologies such as React, Next.js, Node.js, MongoDB, and TailwindCSS.

faqItems.question: Can you work on an existing project?
faqItems.answer: Yes, we offer support for developing existing applications, improving their performance, or adding new features.

faqItems.question: How long does it take to complete a project?
faqItems.answer: The project timeline depends on its complexity and requirements. Smaller projects typically take a few weeks, while larger ones can take several months.

faqItems.question: Do you offer technical support after the project is completed?
faqItems.answer: Yes, we provide technical support, maintenance, and possible updates after the project is deployed.

faqItems.question: What technologies do you use?
faqItems.answer:
We use modern technologies, such as:
• Frontend: React, Next.js, Vite, TailwindCSS
• Backend: Node.js, Express, MongoDB
• Others: API integrations, Microsoft Graph

faqItems.question: How can I start working with you?
faqItems.answer: Simply contact us through the contact form, and we will respond within 24 hours to discuss the project details.
